issue.title: Eigenvalue problems extremely slow using default conda install

content.raw: A random thought – I’ve seen some big performance hits on some stacks due to numpy/scipy apparently trying to use multiple threads inside some matrix routines.  Maybe it’s worth explicitly setting OMP\_NUM\_THREADS=1 or similar to be sure that isn’t happening here for any of the stacks?
